20101212140637.667|20101212140638.333|CCO|>> Reporter: MADOFF AND HIS 
20101212140638.333|20101212140639.000|CCO|YOUNGER BROTHER ANDREW TURNED

20101212140639.667|20101212140640.333|CCO|AFTER HE CONFESSED, BUT THE SONS
20101212140640.333|20101212140641.000|CCO|WERE NEVER ABLE TO ESCAPE 
20101212140641.000|20101212140642.667|CCO|SUSPICION THAT THEY, TOO, WERE 
20101212140642.667|20101212140644.333|CCO|IN ON THE SCAM, WHICH THEY 
20101212140644.333|20101212140646.000|CCO|DENIED.

20101212140647.667|20101212140649.333|CCO|TRUSTEE IN THE CASE SUED, 
20101212140649.333|20101212140651.000|CCO|DEMANDING MARK MADOFF RETURN 
20101212140651.000|20101212140652.667|CCO|SOME $67 MILLION IN ILLEGAL 
20101212140652.667|20101212140654.333|CCO|PAYMENTS TO THE VICTIMS SAYING 
20101212140654.333|20101212140656.000|CCO|MADOFF KNEW, SHOULD HAVE KNOWN
